The damage [[mob]]s deal to players is affected by the [[difficulty]] setting of the [[world]] they are in. The values below represent the amount of damage taken per hit.
* For most attacks, the damage is scaled as follows: if a mob deals ''D'' damage on Normal difficulty, then it deals 1.5''D'' on Hard difficulty and min(''D'', 0.5''D''+1) on Easy difficulty.
* A mob attacking ''another mob'' always deals its Normal difficulty damage regardless of the current difficulty setting.
* The values for a [[creeper]], [[ghast]], and [[wither]] assume the player is directly adjacent to the respective [[explosion]].
* The damage of [[slime]]s and [[Magma Cube|magma cubes]] depends on their size. Tiny slimes, while hostile, are unable to inflict damage directly.
* Mobs deal no damage to players on Peaceful difficulty.
* The [[warden]] gives [[Darkness]] to nearby players, and [[elder guardian]]s give [[Mining Fatigue]], but these are not attacks. Players simply receive these effects when in range of the mobs.
